details.name: description
details.old_value:
We should do a release asap. Server freeze is fixed and unicode support is done.
Let's finish 2.73 tickets and adjust the translation files.
details.new_value:
We should do a release asap. Server freeze is fixed and unicode support is done.
Let's finish 2.73 tickets and adjust the translation files.   

Critical issues:
* #774: mouse bug
* #814: VM_Create issue
* #822: download code fallback
* #825: Mac OS X crash

Annoying:
* #826: Unicode incompatibility
* #823: Not connecting after download

All other issues seem non critical.

details.new_value:
We should do a release asap. Server freeze is fixed and unicode support is done.
Let's finish 2.73 tickets and adjust the translation files.   

Critical issues:
* #774: mouse bug
* #814: VM_Create issue
* #822: download code fallback
* #825: Mac OS X crash

Annoying:
* #826: Unicode incompatibility
* #823: Not connecting after download

All other issues seem non critical.



* Freeze
# Choose a target release date, set in x days/weeks
# Update in-game credits
# Check enabled features
# Only critical bug fixes and translation allowed
# Call to translators (blog post or IRC)

* Build
# Windows, Linux 32 and 64 bit, MacOS X packages from current master are built
# Linux builds are compiled against oldest glibc as possible for maximum compatibility (CentOS 5/6)
## Ensure libs like libasound2-dev are installed before building
# All mod files are put in etl_bin.pk3
# Builds/Installer are shared internally to QA team (Dropbox)
# Update of Omni-bot packages on mirror

* Game testing
# Test server is updated with test build
# "Testing night" are scheduled for devs and QA team (blog post?)
# Test both the ET:L client and the 2.60b client (connection to Legacy mod, possible UI errors)
## Test multiple installed screens
# Duration: about X days, or X testing sessions.

* Tag
# Integrate last translation files
# Integrate last credits changes
# Ensure all versioned strings are updated (ie, UNICODE_SUPPORT_VERSION)
# Update default values in ETLVersion.cmake
# Tag release in Git

* Installer
# Installer are created
# Final installer testing by QA team (ensure etl_bin.pk3 is complete)

* Release
# update release packages on mirror
# update download page on website
# update credits on website
# new release blog post
# news shared on Twitter/Facebook/forums/etc.

* Enjoy!

journals.notes:
Bugs list caught in the testing session:

{FIXME}
- -better wiki explanation about doing a clean install (especially for mac users: remove ~/Library/Application\ Support/etlegacy/legacy)-
- -issue with cg_simpleitems shader, see #861-
- -fix windows installer (ignore OB)-
- -gibs don't make hitsounds- {TODO} Check damage given! Fix hit/shot gib stats (delaying to later, see #478)
- -lower default warmup value from public config (30 seconds?)-
- -cannot see progression of vote as spectator- {TODO} also add result to client console
- -stamina bar isn't working when you are spectating-
- game doesn't recover automatically after a gfx driver crash
- sniper shot is sometimes inaccurate (related to pmove_fixed 1, see http://bani.anime.net/banimod/forums/viewtopic.php?p=40394&sid=d65b880747a0487bf5102914d449606b)
- no construction sound when building CP or barrier on bremen map (to be checked, other people around heard the sounds) (delaying to later)

I did file the open issues:

#862 #863 #864

subject: Release 2.74
